creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
text:
The OSCOM demo and/or the Form Editor are currently not usable.

These operations do not work:

1. editing an element for one of the matrix sample pages such as "Apache 
Cocoon" (hitting return while the focus is in the edit field shows the default 
value again. That is not the expected reaction. The Save-button works.)

2. deleting elements by clicking on the red cross (nothing happens). This works 
after clicking the Save-button once.

3. when I click on "Admin" an additional "Site"-menu is displayed 
between "Admin" and "Authoring" but clicking on "Site" results in an error:

---
An Error Occurred org.apache.cocoon.ProcessingException Unable to get 
transformer handler for cocoon://lenya-page/oscom/info/default.xml 
org.apache.cocoon.ProcessingException: Unable to get transformer handler for 
cocoon://lenya-page/oscom/info/default.xml: 
org.apache.excalibur.xml.xslt.XSLTProcessorException: Exception in creating 
Transform Handler org.apache.cocoon.ResourceNotFoundException: No pipeline 
matched request: menu-xml/oscom/info/default.xml Original Exception: 
org.apache.excalibur.xml.xslt.XSLTProcessorException: Exception in creating 
Transform Handler at 
org.apache.excalibur.xml.xslt.XSLTProcessorImpl.getTransformerHandlerAndValidity
(XSLTProcessorImpl.java:375) at 
org.apache.cocoon.transformation.TraxTransformer.setup
(TraxTransformer.java:302) at 
org.apache.cocoon.components.pipeline.AbstractProcessingPipeline.setupPipeline
(AbstractProcessingPipeline.java:394) at 
...
---

4. trying to view the "CMS Matrix" or "Home" again as Editor results in the 
following error-message. It is not obvious how one can proceed from that 
situation.
---

Message: You must set a generator first before you can use a serializer.

Description: org.apache.cocoon.ProcessingException: You must set a generator 
first before you can use a serializer.

Sender: org.apache.cocoon.servlet.CocoonServlet

Source: Cocoon Servlet

Request URI

lenya/oscom/authoring/matrix/index.html

cause

org.apache.cocoon.ProcessingException: You must set a generator first before 
you can use a serializer.

request-uri

/lenya/oscom/authoring/matrix/index.html

creator: gregor@apache.org
